item.title: Consulting company in Chennai | TenSketch
item.description: Consulting Our USP lies in consulting our design and branding works. Consulting a clientâ€™s requirement differs from just gathering and working on it. We optimize the requirements by adding or removing elements from it. We organize and prepare the contents in a way that is competitive to their market. The client is free to accept consulting or not. The process of consulting includes, Collecting raw requirements Analysis Removal of redundant data Adding competitive contents Organizing and documentation Proposal to client
